docs.snippet: Sitting in the cheap seats has always been seen as an object of ridicule, but it’s the best place to see a baseball game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sitting in the cheap seats has always been seen as an object of ridicule, but it’s the best place to see a baseball game.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Will Leitch describes his affection for nosebleed seats in baseball stadiums, noting they are place where die-hard fans of teams will sit, even when their teams are doing poorly.

headline.main: Take Me Out to the Nosebleeds

docs.snippet: South Korea's Chung Mong-joon has said he is facing a 15-year suspension by FIFA's Ethics Committee that has "sabotaged" his campaign for the FIFA Presidency, but he denied any wrongdoing and vowed to continue his bid to lead soccer's world govern...
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's Chung Mong-joon has said he is facing a 15-year suspension by FIFA's Ethics Committee that has "sabotaged" his campaign for the FIFA Presidency, but he denied any wrongdoing and vowed to continue his bid to lead soccer's world governing body.

headline.main: FIFA Presidential Candidate Chung Mong-Joon 'Facing Suspension'
